completion.item: <[!CDATA[Adds a selection listener on the tableParameters: gara.jswt.SelectionListener listener - the desired listener to be added to this tableThrows: TypeError - if the listener is not a SelectionListener ]]>

<[!CDATA[Deselects a specific itemParameters:
gara.jswt.TreeItem item - the item to deselect
				]]>

<[!CDATA[Looks for the index of a specified itemParameters: gara.jswt.TableItem item - the item for the indexThrows: gara.jswt.ItemNotExistsException - if the item does not exist in this tableTypeError - if the item is not a TableItemReturns: the index of the specified item ]]>

<[!CDATA[Removes a selection listener from this tableParameters: gara.jswt.SelectionListener listener - the listener to be removed from this tableThrows: TypeError - if the listener is not a SelectionListener ]]>
<[!CDATA[Selects an itemParameters: gara.jswt.TableItem item - the item that should be selectedThrows: TypeError - if the item is not a TableItem ]]>
